name: Apricot Rum Fizz
description: This cocktail is a slightly modified version of Toast's Apricot Fizz. Not that their drinks aren't brilliant, mind, it's just that I personally don't care for spiced rum (I think the "spice" is added by distillers in attempt to mask the lower quality of the rum), and I prefer the sharp sass of ginger beer over ginger ale's plebeian sweetness.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a few ice cubes to a serving glass. Pour in rum, apricot nectar, and lime juice, then top with ginger beer. Stir lightly and serve immediately.
